column2: Hello Dear Candidate, Greetings for the day Please find the Company Profile and Job Description mentioned below. Telus International Health Care Domain is in the business of helping organizations help their people because we believe that engaged people are the driving force for society. Every day, the expertise of our employees is recognized as essential to the financial security, health and productivity of our clients and their people. We are always looking for talented professionals and strategic leaders who will listen and work together with colleagues to form long-term relationships and to deliver integrated solutions that fit. As we continue to grow, we??e presently engaging with exceptional candidates interested in growing our global sales teams. Url: https://www.telusinternational.com Note: This role is for Permanent Work From Home? Days Working: 05 days working Monday to Friday? Shift timings: Evening Shift 05.30 pm to 02.30 pm or 06.00 pm to 03.00 pm or Early Morning Shifts Salary: On current CTC 20% to 30% hike max (Depends on your Interview) Responsibilities Role Description As a senior Tender Coordinator Bid Writer at TELUS Health, you will assist in coordinating and preparing tender submissions to support our business growth. Your role involves: Manage the tender process from start to finish, including coordinating team members and stakeholders. Lead the development of high-quality tender submissions and proposals. Ensure compliance with tender requirements and deadlines. Review and analyse tender documents to identify key requirements and develop tailored responses. Provide guidance and support to junior tender coordinators in preparing tender submissions. Liaise with internal and external stakeholders to gather information and insights for tender submissions. Contribute to the development of bid strategies and win themes. Assist in coordinating and preparing tender submissions to support business growth. Ensure all tender documents are ready for review by the bid manager within specified times. Key Accountabilities Your key responsibilities will include: Manage the end-to-end tender process, including planning, coordinating, and executing tender submissions. Develop and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients and partners. Lead and coordinate bid team meetings and reviews. Review and edit tender documents for clarity, consistency, and compliance. Ensure all tender submissions are of high quality and meet company standards. Maintain a database of tender documentation and templates. Skills & Experience To succeed in this role, you should have: Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Strong analytical and strategic thinking abilities. Proven experience in tender coordination and bid writing, preferably in a similar industry. Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines. Strong attention to detail and organisational skills. Education Tertiary qualifications in a relevant field (e.g., business, marketing, communications). Previous experience in a similar role.

column2: Job   Description Job   Title:  Assistant Manager Reconciliation & Claims Management Location:  Bengaluru 1.   PURPOSE   OF   ROLE  Responsible for managing the day-to-day volumes related to reconciliation, collection entries etc.  Ensure OTC activities are processed on time with high levels of accuracy. Work smart and impact results leading to effective customers reconciliations and claims  Responsible for the Adhoc activities from Lead and ensure 100% accuracy 2.   KEY   TASKS   AND   ACCOUNTABILITIES  Manage the day-to-day volumes by ensuring OTC (AR) deliverables in terms of reconciliation/claims processed on time and queries actioned on time  Deliver operational SLAs and KPIs  Should be able to work independently without many follow-ups  Should have good accounting knowledge  Should be able to collaborate with multiple teams and stakeholders  Ensure daily MICS and SOX compliance during day-to-day transactions  End-to-End AR process knowledge/understanding  Attention to detail and accuracy  Voluntarily support when required to meet Business requirements by displaying Ownership  Excellent knowledge of MS office (Outlook, excel, PowerPoint etc.)  Good communication skills - oral and written and lead discussions with key stakeholders  Performing Root Cause analysis for recurring or high severity issues  Implementing corrective action and preventive action for recurring process related issues  Good knowledge on Finance ERP and reporting systems 3.   BUSINESS   ENVIRONMENT   Main   Characteristics:  -  Maintain   effective   relationships   with   key   stakeholders   (Business/Sales) ?? Evaluation   Criteria   (Targets): -  Adhoc   deliverables   as   and   when   given   by   dotted   line   manager -  Maintain   100%   SLA   and   KPI -  Number   of   value   adds:   Process   Improvements ?? Key   Dimensions:  -  India   Business ?? Key   Contacts: -  Customers -  Country   Specific   Business   Partner/POCs -  Internal   teams   stakeholders   Sales,   Finance,   ATR   etc. ?? Geographical   Scope:  -  India 4.   QUALIFICATIONS,   EXPERIENCE,   SKILLS ??Level of educational attainment required: o Chartered Accountant ??Previous work experience required o Experience of working in OTC (Mainly AR) ??Language skills required  o English (Fluent) ??IT skills required o Microsoft Office (mandatory) o ERP (Syspro will be added advantage) o Reporting Tools   5.   COMPETENCIES Behavioural Competencies: ??Builds trust ??Honest and fair ??Interpersonal skills ??Positive attitude ??Productive ??Takes responsibility ??Problem solving ??Planned and organized Interpersonal Expertise: ??Respect for others ??Supports diversity and understand others perspectives ??Communicates effectively 6.   BEHAVIOURAL   COMPETENCIES AB   InBev   Global   Competencies Think big, and takes on big challenges Essential Develop the best people and teams Desired Has impact and influence Desired Executes with discipline Essential Acts as an owner Essential Leads by example Essential
